meanings.definition: Make or cause to make a clonking sound.
meanings.sent1: The old car engine was clonking loudly.
meanings.sent2: I heard the metal pipe clonking against the wall.
meanings.sent3: The clonking noise from the washing machine made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The hammer clonking on the metal echoed through the workshop.
meanings.sent5: The heavy raindrops clonking on the roof kept me awake all night.

meanings.sent1: The clonking of the drums filled the room with rhythm.
meanings.sent2: We could hear the clonking of footsteps in the hallway.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected clonking of the door startled the cat.
meanings.sent4: The clonking of the clock reminded him of the passing time.
meanings.sent5: The clonking of the hammer on the anvil signaled the start of the blacksmith's work.
